member.name: M:Conglomo.DataPump.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Defines the entry point of the application.

member.name: T:Conglomo.DataPump.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Conglomo.DataPump.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Conglomo.DataPump.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Conglomo.DataPump.Properties.Resources.GASPUMP
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Byte[].

member.name: P:Conglomo.DataPump.Properties.Resources.InvalidArguments
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid command line arguments..

member.name: P:Conglomo.DataPump.Properties.Resources.UsageText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Usage: DATAPUMP.EXE [database type] [connection string] [sql file] [output file].
